title: Create coherent collection of rugs (nfts)
body:
We should create and design a coherent set of nfts for the game and reserve some CCGT for the author. Ideally the set consist of NFTS with at least three properties. For now I was thinking about the following properties:

- A game level and a price.
- The type of rug as background (common)
- A logo on top of the rug. (rare)
- A logo filled with a pattern of a cookie (very rare)

I propose we allocate some sum of CCGT for the person that comes up with:
 
- An implemented and extenisble design framework. (background, logo, print etc..)
- At least 64 rugs.
- In both common, rare and very rare types.
author: 0x1e133277eb9f7A576b051877B0A493e9E42845C1
